summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NEXUS Supply Chain OS Phase 2 features. Backend APIs 94% functional (15/16 tests passed), frontend UI working excellently with all Phase 2 components operational: Interactive Leaflet logistics map, D3.js supplier network graph, and Neuro-Symbolic reasoning engine all functioning correctly.

flaky_endpoints.issue: Command 'explain decision trace' does not return neuro_symbolic UI component
flaky_endpoints.symptoms: LLM processing overrides fallback logic for neuro_symbolic component mapping
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Use alternative commands like 'neuro symbolic' which work correctly

passed_tests: All 13 core backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Phase 2 logistics map command returns map component
Phase 2 supplier network command returns supplier_network component
Interactive Leaflet map with 12 distribution centers and route visualization
Map toggle buttons for Routes and Shipments working correctly
D3.js supplier network graph with force-directed layout rendering
Region filter buttons (All, Americas, EMEA, APAC) functional
High Risk filter button working on supplier network
Neuro-Symbolic reasoning engine displays with agent selector buttons
All 5 AI agents displaying with correct metrics and confidence levels
Command interface processing AI commands with GPT-5.2 integration
Dynamic UI component generation (ephemeral UI paradigm)
WebSocket connection stable for real-time updates
Original features maintained and working correctly
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor: Fix LLM command mapping for neuro_symbolic component - ensure 'explain decision trace' command properly triggers neuro_symbolic UI component in backend fallback logic
